bibl.title: The Arsinoite komogrammateis and Their komogrammateiai in the Roman Period.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Komogrammateia of Ptolemais Hormou. - Komogrammateia of Hiera Nesos. - Komogrammateia of Karanis. - Conclusion: locating three komogrammateiai of the meris of Herakleides on a map.

bibl.title: New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005

bibl.seg: 241 Hiera Nesos Karanis Nome Arsinoïte Ptolémaïs Hormou 620
DERDA Tomasz, The Arsinoite komogrammateis and Their komogrammateiai in the Roman Period.

Mario CAPASSO and Paola DAVOLI (Edd.), New Archaeological and Papyrological Researches on the Fayyum. Proceedings of the International Meeting of Egyptology and Papyrology, Lecce, June 8th-10th, 2005 = Papyrologica Lupiensia. 14/2005 (Galatina, 2007) pp. 125-134, 1 carte.
[Introduction.] - Komogrammateia of Ptolemais Hormou. - Komogrammateia of Hiera Nesos. - Komogrammateia of Karanis. - Conclusion: locating three komogrammateiai of the meris of Herakleides on a map.
